WorkItem.ClosedComment: http://tw.wowarmory.com seems to work again, resubmit ticket if it does not.
WorkItem.Description:
Lately some people including myself has had a problem with using the normal Taiwan Armory site. This also means I can't load from Armory within Rawr. Someone suggested using "http://armory.wowtaiwan.com.tw" instead of the old "http://tw.wowarmory.com".
The new link works so far on my browser. But I haven't found a way to change the address with Rawr.
Could you please somehow add "http://armory.wowtaiwan.com.tw" to the Taiwan Armory address?
WorkItem.Summary: Possible Taiwan Armory site address change
